function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change impacting social goals and built environment","Impact":"Limiting the extent to achieve regenerative development ambitions","Mitigation":"Integrating climate change considerations into social goals and built environment planning","Technologies":"Sustainable and regenerative building technologies","People":"Community planners, developers, and policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and planning authorities"},{"Description":"Complex systems comprehension and reductionist science","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of interconnected systems in the built environment","Mitigation":"Promoting interdisciplinary collaboration and systems thinking in building design and analysis","Technologies":"Interconnected data analytics and simulation tools","People":"Architects, engineers, and scientists","Owner":"Professional associations and educational institutions"}]}
